features: 🌛【Why Anvo Premium Memory Foam Pillow?】: 3-5 second slow rebound high density memory foam and Ergonomic design giving good support to your neck, promotes muscle relaxation, eliminates neck, head shoulders and back pain. It's CertiPUR-US certified (LAB REPORT I.D. : E392-2021-00556001) to ensure safety and durability

🌛【Breathable Skin-friendly Pillowcase】: outer pillowcase made of super comfortable breathable fabric and meshed sides will give you cooling feel. The breathable inner cover extends the life of memory foam core effectively. Outer cover is machine-washed

🌛【2 Personalized Height in A pillow for Any Sleep Style】: Anvo contour cervical pillow with size 24*13.4*3.5/4.7 inch ( L x W x H) has two neck support levels to support your neck naturally which provide customize fit for side, back, or stomach sleeper. Snooze away and neck aches away in the morning

🎁【Perfect Gifts】: This slow rebound memory foam cervical neck pillow is appropriate for elderly, office workers, students and all ages people for deeper sleep. Good gift to show your care to somebody you concerned
🌛 WARM TIPS: Memory foam pillow can only be helpful for improving sleeping quality, can’t be used for diagnosis or treatment of any disease (e.g. cervical spondylosis.)

Q1: Is this cervical pillow for neck pain can be used for cervical spondylosis? A1: Anvo contour memory foam pillow can only be helpful for improving sleeping quality, can't be used for diagnosis (e.g. cervical spondylosis.) Q2. What should I do if the memory foam neck pillow is too hard or too soft for me? A2. No gap between pillow and your shoulders. It has two heights, the higher side is firmer than the lower side. You can use higher side and put towels or clothes under pillow if pillow is too soft, or use lower side if too firm for you. Q3. What should I do if I feel uncomfortable when using this neck pillow for pain relief sleeping at the first time? A3. It's a normal situation that you may experience some discomfort during the first two weeks while your body is trying to adjust to the correct position. Our pillows are ergonomically designed to protect your spine for a long-term use. Q4. The pillow is rolled up in a sealed vacuum bag, will affect the support of pillow? A4. As it's made of high density slow rebound memory foam. It will go back to its original shape right away when the package is opened. And it is more convenient for you to carry our neck pain pillow when you travel. Q5. Does the pillow have any weired smell? The memory foam itself will have a very slight smell, which is normal. Please wash the pillowcase before use and leave the core in well-ventilated area for 1-3 days. The smell will gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had this pillow just a couple of days now but my neck and shoulder pain is already gone and I sleep so much better at night. Less tossing and turning and no more waking up with pain in my shoulder and neck. I gave up the infamous "MyPillows" after experiencing months of pain when waking up. I had both a firm and soft MyPillow and both would "deflate" at the neck and I would wake up with my neck crunched up and my opposite shoulder nearly touching my ear. With this new pillow that hasn't happened! I've been using the "firm" side but it's so nice and cradling it doesn't feel "firm." I can't put into words how pleasant this pillow is to use. I normally sleep on my side with my arm above my head (as if I am raising my hand in class) and I am still able to sleep that way but it is also just as comfortable to extend my arm out in front of me along the lower edge of the pillow. I tend to roll forward towards my stomach because I kick my knee out in front of me and either arm position is completely comfortable. I'm in love. I can't believe I waited so long to buy this. **Note: this is my first pillow shaped like this so I have no additional points of reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby is one happy sleeper!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this neck pillow to replace the last one hubby used. It’s supposed to be firm but when it arrived it didn’t feel firm. However…hubby slept on it and it’s not squishy when his head is on it. He loves the two sides of high or low depending on how his neck feels. Also it’s a hwavy weighted pillow. If you’re looking to CURE your neck pain…I’ve no idea if this is for you. But…hubby said it does support his neck and he sleeps well. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good pillow at a great price. Not too hard not too soft. The only thing I do not like about it is the length. It is all most too long for a standard pillowcase. Which the description says should fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10000 years and no more crick in my neck
reviews.reviewText: For years I have been bunching up my pillow to side sleep. This is so comfortable, firm and, supportive. I love it so much I want to take it with me when I am out of town.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Comfortable, head and neck better supported compared to a standard pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT - FINALLY FOUND THE RIGHT PILLOW!!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried and return more than 10 pillows in the last year trying to find one that worked for me. This one came out of the box with very little to no smell and it puffed up quickly so I could use it the first night.I put my pillowcase on and it fit great - not to large or small or odd shaped. I move lots when I sleep and change positions and there was no pain or frustration with trying to get the pillow to fit to my new position!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these about 6 months ago and left it behind on a visit. When ordering the product again, it said this is what I had ordered. The new pillow came and was lighter and less dense. I have had about 10 contour pillows over the years looking for the right fit. Most forget they are pillows after about 6 months and I start dreaming of a new one. The original one I ordered was a firm pillow with some weight to it and it supported my neck very well. This one does not seem like it is going to last and is not what I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the pillows from this seller, and I am thoroughly impressed with the quality of the product. These pillows are incredibly comfortable, providing excellent support for my head, neck, and spine while I sleep. The material used to make these pillows is soft and breathable, keeping me cool throughout the night, and I don't wake up with any soreness or stiffness.What I appreciate about these pillows is that they retain their shape, even after extended use. The pillows do not flatten out, and they continue to provide the same level of support as when I first purchased them. This feature has made them a long-term investment for my sleep health.Another feature that makes these pillows stand out is their size. The standard size fits perfectly on my bed, and they complement my sleeping position. Additionally, I believe that these pillows offer excellent value for money, and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase them again or recommend them to others.Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase of these pillows. They have exceeded my expectations, providing a comfortable and supportive sleeping experience. If you are in the market for a new pillow, I highly recommend giving these a try.
It did not improve my pain at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Met my expectations. Quite Comfortable to use when sleeping.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the pillow. It met my expectations.
